approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The task creation process must include a text field for a description. The description field should accept a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 255 characters.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. The list should display the task descriptions.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly.  The initial page load time should be under 3 seconds on a standard internet connection (e.g., 10 Mbps).

requirements.title: Security Implementation
requirements.description: The application shall be secure. The system must protect user data from unauthorized access and prevent common web vulnerabilities.

raw_analysis.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks
